greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Riesel problem: a(n) = smallest m >= 0 such that n*2^m-1 is prime, or -1 if no such prime exists.
link: T. D. Noe and Eric Chen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..2292 (first 1000 terms from T. D. Noe)
mathematica: Table[m = 0; While[! PrimeQ[n*2^m - 1], m++]; m, {n, 100}] (* _Arkadiusz Wesolowski_, Sep 04 2011 *)
program: print([a(n) for n in range(1, 88)]) # _Michael S. Branicky_, Feb 01 2021
results.author: _David W. Wilson_
